Package com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders

Class ControlBuilder<C extends javafx.scene.control.Control,B extends ControlBuilder<C,B>>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.NodeBuilder<C,B>
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.ControlBuilder<C,B>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of control to be built
B - the type of the concrete builder
Direct Known Subclasses:
LabeledBuilder
public abstract class ControlBuilder<C extends javafx.scene.control.Control,B extends ControlBuilder<C,B>> extends NodeBuilder<C,B>
An abstract base class for building nodes, providing a fluent API for configuring and creating instances of the node type specified by the generic parameter N.
